parameters.description: Your API-key provided by Stena Line

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API-key provided by Stena Line

200.description: Gate In event will be processed by Stena Line

eventDateTime.description: Date and time when event was first captured according to ISO8601 (including timezone offset from UTC and with millisecond resolution).

eventSender.description: Stena Line Unique Identifier of the system sending the event to Stena Line. Will be assigned to ports by Stena Line.

eventOriginator.description: Originator of the event, used for traceability. Typically contains the user ID of the administrator or ID of the machine who triggered the event. Unique within the eventSender scope. Should not contain personal data according to GDPR privacy.

primaryId.description: Primary identifier of the unit, i.e. vehicle reg, trailer fleet number, VIN, ILU-code or other

secondaryId.description: Additional identifier of the unit i(if available), i.e vehicle reg, trailer fleet number, VIN, ILU-code or other

unit.description: Identifier of the unit being shipped

UNLocationCode.description: The UN/LOCODE (without whitespace) which the facility resides in

facilityCode.description: Unique Code for the terminal within the facilityCodeListProvider scope

facilityCodeListProvider.description: Provider of the Facility Code (SLFT = Stena Line Freight)

locationName.description: Name of location according to the sender of the event.

address.description: Street/postal address of the main gate  (if no public road - the address for leaving the public road to be used)

lane.description: A lane where multiple rolling units can be placed after each other within the facility. Unique within the facility

code.description: Facility unique code for the position

position.description: A precise position in the facility able to store only one unit

section.description: An area in the facility typically able to have multiple units stored within it. Unique within the facility

yard.description: Physcial location/area in the yard within the Facility where the unit will be placed past the gateIn

eventLocation.description: The physical location at which the event took place

url.description: URL from which the file can be downloaded

access.description: By what means can the url be accessed ( open = access from internet only by using URL, restricted= some kind of accessrestriction such as password is required for access)

attachments.description: Applicable attachments such as images (proof or identification).

remarks.description: Remarks or comments associated with the event. Typically an external booking number

rearRegNo.description: Rear Vehicle License Plate Number as detected during the gate event

frontRegNo.description: Front Vehicle License Plate Number as detected during the Gate event

vehicle.description: Information about the vehicle passing the gate

liftTime.description: Time at which the movement started from the vessel.

putTime.description: Time at which the movement ended and the unit was put down at the yard.

vesselFlag.description: Vessel flag state - country code according to ISO3166 Alpha-2

vesselCallSignNumber.description: Radio call sign of the vessel

deckLane.description: Identifier for lane within a loading deck

deckZone.description: Area on loading deck covering one or more lanes

stowage.description: Where the unit is stowed onboard the vessel
